solution_line_template: Ursula's boss want's the commercial to be {shorten_percentage} * {original_length} = <<{shorten_percentage}*{original_length}={seconds_shorter}>>{seconds_shorter} seconds shorter.
After Ursula makes the desired changes, the ad is going to be {original_length} - {seconds_shorter} = <<{original_length}-{seconds_shorter}={shortened_length}>>{shortened_length} seconds long.
